title: Prince Andrew gives up royal titles including Duke of York after 'discussion with King'
description: In a statement, the prince says: "The continued accusations about me distract from the work of His Majesty and the Royal Family."
content:
Prince Andrew to remain a prince after giving up titles
Sean Coughlan
Royal correspondent
Prince Andrew is to give up his titles, including the Duke of York, he has announced in a personal statement.
He has been under increasing pressure for his link... [3660 chars]

title: Prince Andrew to give up all his titles and honours, including Duke of York
description: It follows increasing pressure on Prince Andrew after more reports emerged of his relationship with paedophile financier Jeffrey Epstein, and his relationship with an alleged Chinese spy.
content:
Prince Andrew has announced he is to give up his titles, including the Duke of York.
However, he will remain a prince, having been born the son of Queen Elizabeth II.
His former wife, Sarah Ferguson, will also no longer use her title of The Duchess o... [3121 chars]

title: Family of Mango founder say his son played no part in his fatal cliff fall amid investigation
description: The 71-year-old billionaire died while hiking near Barcelona. He founded Mango in 1984 and had an estimated worth of $4.5bn (£3.6bn).
content:
The family of Mango founder Isak Andic, who died after falling from a cliff, say his son did not play any part in the incident.
It comes after several local media outlets in Spain reported that Mr Andic's death was being investigated as a possible ho... [2015 chars]

title: F1 practice LIVE: United States Grand Prix 2025 times, results & radio from Austin
description: Follow live text updates and listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from the practice session for the United States Grand Prix.
content:
Report: Norris sets pace in US Grand Prix practice
Andrew Benson
BBC F1 correspondent in Austin
McLaren's Lando Norris set the pace in practice at the United States Grand Prix, split from team-mate and title rival Oscar Piastri by Sauber's Nico Hulke... [6560 chars]

title: Cole Palmer out for six more weeks, raising doubts over World Cup spot
description: Enzo Maresca said a groin injury meant Cole Palmer would be out till the end of November, ruling him out of another set of England matches
content:
Enzo Maresca has said Cole Palmer will miss another six weeks with a groin injury, raising doubts over whether the Chelsea forward will be able to regain his England place before the 2026 World Cup.
Palmer, who has been unavailable during the past tw... [2175 chars]
